channel.title: Comments on: Saying Farewell to MADPASS and Hello to FoxPASS
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: genomon
item.dc:creator: genomon
item.description: It just figures. I only made it to 2 MADPASS meetings because we are short-staffed. Now we are hiring and I can go and you up and leave :(<br /> Serious - congrats and I'm sure FoxPASS will be an excellent organization because of you!
item.content:encoded:
It just figures. I only made it to 2 MADPASS meetings because we are short-staffed. Now we are hiring and I can go and you up and leave üôÅ
Serious – congrats and I’m sure FoxPASS will be an excellent organization because of you!

item.title: By: Jes Schultz Borland (grrlgeek)
item.dc:creator: Jes Schultz Borland (grrlgeek)
item.description: Jennifer - I'll take you up on the offer!
item.content:encoded: Jennifer – I’ll take you up on the offer!

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Thanks for all your help with MadPASS and good luck with FoxPASS. We will miss you! I'd like to present at an upcoming FoxPASS meeting sometime :)
item.content:encoded: Thanks for all your help with MadPASS and good luck with FoxPASS. We will miss you! I’d like to present at an upcoming FoxPASS meeting sometime üôÇ

item.title: By: Tim Benninghoff
item.dc:creator: Tim Benninghoff
item.description: Jes, thanks so much for all of your help. We're going to miss you!
item.content:encoded: Jes, thanks so much for all of your help. We’re going to miss you!

item.title: By: Andrew Neuman
item.dc:creator: Andrew Neuman
item.description: Too bad I don't live there anymore. Nice going Jes!
item.content:encoded: Too bad I don’t live there anymore. Nice going Jes!

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: Phew...for a moment I though you jumped from SQL Server to FoxPro :-)
item.content:encoded: Phew…for a moment I though you jumped from SQL Server to FoxPro üôÇ
